tacticulous.game.commands

Class UnitCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • tacticulous.game.commands.UnitCommand

  • public abstract class UnitCommand
extends Object
    Contains methods used for attacking and moving units.

    O

                int toX,

        Checks if unit can move to target tile.
        Parameters:
        map -
        unit -
        toX -
        toY -
        costs - movement cost map from unit's current location.
        Returns:
        false if target tile is outside map bounds, occupied by another unit, or unit is too slow.

        unit -
        toX -
        toY -

         Unit attacker,
         Tile target)
        Attacks unit in target tile.
        Parameters:

        attacker -
        target -
        Returns:
